parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set if a control of the currently active user dialog is shown or not.

Read [[Arma: GUI Configuration]] for more information about user dialogs and controls.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[ctrlShow]] [idc, show]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, show]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] - control ID

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> show: [[Boolean]] - true if the control should be shown, false if not

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> controlName [[ctrlShow]] show

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value>  controlName: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> show: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ctrlShow]] [100, [[false]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlShow]] [[false]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlVisible]], [[ctrlShown]], [[ctrlEnable]]
</value></part></template>
